name: HardCube Game 2
description:
Rogue-lite platformer

By passing levels you will get perks like double jump, which is saves after real death. 

You have 8 minutes to complete the game or it will restart. 

If you die you go to heaven and if you beat heaven level you would get back to the death place. 

A lot of different platfroms. 

Have some basic puzzle moments. 

Good for speedrunning
